title: (x) 2 straight-sided tech sans - Klavika, Apex New {Thomas Binder, Tomi K}
content:
Hi there! :D I need your help, I’ve been trying to identify this font, looking thru my collection but i can’t seem to find anything remotely similar to this.. i have tried DIN and Interstate but they don’t seem to match these 2 fonts.. :)

can you guys help me ID both of them? :)

Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905043550im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Untitled-1_6471.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905043550im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/register-1_4224.jpg)

 [‹ (x) Sans on Topshop flyer - Interstate {Patricia}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905043550/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40275 "Go to previous forum topic") [Looking for the origin of stencil square sans digitized as Hemi Head (Larabie Fonts) ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905043550/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40258 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Radiculous

comments.content: spot on! :D thanks poms :D all i need is the hoxteth library font
